channel.title: Bharat Chandra
channel.description: Hi I am Bharat and I like to build things.On this website I will share my projects ,hobbies and ideas.

item.title: Blue Moon
item.description:
When two full moons occur simultaneously in a month then the second moon is called a blue moon.And today we had the blue moon and the moon was also a supermoon because it was closed to the earth.So the moon will be in the perigee of the elliptical orbit.

Also, the moon underwent a total lunar eclipse. So we observed the event using a telescope. Here are some pics of the eclipse observed from Salt Lake, Kolkata.

In 2018 we will see the second blue moon on march 31, so in this year we will have two blue moons which will be rare event.We will only see such an event in 2037.
